description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Trans-Allegheny Pioneers. Historical sketches of the first white settlements west of the Alleghenies, etc" Author: HALE, John P. - of Charleston Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10409.c.14." Page: 85 Place of Publishing: Cincinnati Date of Publishing: 1886 Publisher: Graphic Press Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001566727 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
